alert.note: Alert for Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 6:04PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL BIG HORN AND SOUTH CENTRAL ROSEBUD COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 604 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Lame Deer, or 28 miles south of Colstrip, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Busby, Muddy Cluster, and Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
